name: Light Pollution
description:
The mayor is having a stargazing party, but oh no! Lights from the city are obscuring the stars! You, a pigeon, have been hired to turn out all the lights and save the mayor's party.

Use 'WASD' to move around and jump, and 'SPACE' to turn out lights.

Trenton Nguyen - Audio

James Nammacher - Character Design

Garrett Sundin - Coding
